alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 11:37PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND RICHARDSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1137 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Shubert to 6 miles northwest of Sabetha. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Falls City, Rulo, Verdon, Stella, Shubert, Dawson, Salem, Preston, Barada, Sac and Fox Nation Reservation, Indian Cave State Park, The Highway 75 And 8 Junction, and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
